title: Purse, 17th century
medium:
Medium: metal and horsehair
Technique: woven
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Small folding pocketbook of black horsehair with pattern in silver. Design is a hunting scene with a man on horseback with various animals. Edges bound with very narrow silver braid.

tombstone.epitaph:
Purse, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: metal and horsehair
Technique: woven. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-55-7.
